info.description:
Classic Lines
The scoop back shape gives this chair a smooth, streamlined silhouette and supportive sit. Finished with dark stain legs.

Real-Life Ready
Made to last with solid birch legs and wood frame. Upholstered in a luxurious midnight black fabric for a classic, elegant look.

Mix and Match
Get creative with your colour combinations - pair with a Percy in biscuit beige or marigold orange. Also in grey and beige PU leather.

whybuy.Classic Lines: The scoop back shape gives this chair a smooth, streamlined silhouette and supportive sit. Finished with dark stain legs.

whybuy.Mix and Match: Get creative with your colour combinations - pair with a Percy in biscuit beige or marigold orange. Also in grey and beige PU leather.

Product Details.Suspension: Back - foam. Seat - webbing and cushion

Product Details.Fabric: 52% viscose, 15% cotton, 15% linen, 18% polyester - midnight black

Product Details.Care: Fixed cover and removable seat cushion - professional care only

info.name: Percy Scoop Back Chair in midnight black
